LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Designator_Desc: 拖动来框选要收过路肺的囚犯
LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Setting_LeftFirst_D: 如果选中,则优先摘取左边的器官(左肾,左肺),否则优先摘取右边的器官(右肾,右肺)
LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Setting_IsChangeMed: 如果选中,框选后会自动改变用药限制
LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Setting_MedicalCare: 收过路肺自动前调整为的医药限制:
